Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp. rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, North Avenue and Narragansett: near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, North Avenue and Narragansett: due to, street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Ainslie
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Wilson, Broadway, Foster and Sheridan, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Ainslie

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Wilson, Broadway, Foster, then resume their normal route on Sheridan, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Ainslie.

 Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
